attributes.description:
Please visit our website for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice.
This is a Sexy Coupe designed with all the right angles. She is very clean and mechanically sound with a full service history at Mercedes Benz.  Features include; Panoramic Sun Roof, blue tooth, LED Xenon lights, Navigation,Reverse camera,leather interior, Cruise Control, Satellite Controls on the Steering, Climate Control, AUX/USB Input and much more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged!
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)

attributes.description:
Stunning Silver Polo TSI  in good condition with LOW Mileage and a FULL-Service-History. LOW on fuel. Drives great and the turbo is healthy. This little hatch is also equipped with a panoramic Sunroof for those sunny days.
This is a Pre-Owned Vehicle and Well looked after, Roadworthy given, Clean Vehicle, All Trade-ins Welcome, Financing available at all major Banks, Nationwide delivery, For the best deals in S.A. Don't hesitate, contact us today! Trusted by thousands of loyal customers.

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
